reuze

Class da_StringShuffle

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.da_StringShuffle

  • public class da_StringShuffle
extends java.lang.Object
    Compilation: javac Shuffle.java Execution: java Shuffle < list.txt Reads in a list of strings and prints them in random order. The Knuth (or Fisher-Yates) shuffling algorithm guarantees to rearrange the elements in uniformly random order, under the assumption that Math.random() generates independent and uniformly distributed numbers between 0 and 1. % more cards.txt 2C 3C 4C 5C 6C 7C 8C 9C 10C JC QC KC AC 2D 3D 4D 5D 6D 7D 8D 9D 10D JD QD KD AD 2H 3H 4H 5H 6H 7H 8H 9H 10H JH QH KH AH 2S 3S 4S 5S 6S 7S 8S 9S 10S JS QS KS AS % java Shuffle < cards.txt 6H 9C 8H 7C JS ... KH
